paper.title: Efficient Secure Multi-party Computation
paper.venue: International Conference on the Theory and Application of Cryptology and Information Security
paper.abstract: Since the introduction of secure multi-party computation, all proposed protocols that provide security against cheating players suffer from very high communication complexities.
